# cloudlink.js

![https://www.npmjs.com/package/cloudlink.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/package-npm-red?logo=npm)    ![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/cloud-link-red?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPHN2ZyB2ZXJzaW9uPSIxLjEiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8yMDAwL3N2ZyIgeG1sbnM6eGxpbms9Imh0dHA6Ly93d3cudzMub3JnLzE5OTkveGxpbmsiIHdpZHRoPSIxNzYuMzk4NTQiIGhlaWdodD0iMTIyLjY3MDY5IiB2aWV3Qm94PSIwLDAsMTc2LjM5ODU0LDEyMi42NzA2OSI%2BPGcgdHJhbnNmb3JtPSJ0cmFuc2xhdGUoLTE1MS44MDA3MywtMTE4LjY2NDY2KSI%%2BPGc%%2BPC9nPjwvZz48L2c%2BPC9zdmc%2BPCEtLXJvdGF0aW9uQ2VudGVyOjg4LjE5OTI2OTk5OTk5OTk4OjYxLjMzNTM0NDk5OTk5OTk5LS0%2B&color=%230fbd8c)

cloudlink.js is a port of [MikeDev101's](https://github.com/MikeDev101) cloudlink4 server/client. Only cloudlink 4 will work in this library.

You can check out cloudlink 4 here: https://github.com/MikeDev101/cloudlink
Install using npm [here](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cloudlink.js), or download this repository.
